TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OSFeature extends System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport

summary.span: 提供作業系統特定的功能查詢。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`static`中提供此類別的執行個體查詢作業系統功能的屬性。Use the `static` instance of this class provided in the property to query for operating system features. 您無法建立此類別的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of this class. 若要判斷某項功能的版本，請呼叫方法。To determine the version of a feature, call the method. 若要判斷是否有一項功能或特定版本，請呼叫方法並指定要與這個類別中提供的功能識別碼尋找功能。To determine if a feature or a specific version is present, call the method and specify the feature to look for with the feature identifiers provided in this class. ## Examples 下列範例會使用查詢作業系統以判斷是否功能安裝。The following example uses to query the operating system to determine if the feature is installed. 此範例顯示兩種不同方式的檢查，看看是否有此功能。The example presents two different ways of checking to see whether the feature is present. 在第一個方法中，`myVersion`檢查以查看它是否`null`。In the first method, `myVersion` is checked to see if it is `null`. 如果版本是`null`，未安裝的功能。If the version is `null`, the feature is not installed. 在第二個方法中，此範例會呼叫基底類別方法以查看是否已安裝的功能。In the second method, the example calls the base class method to see if the feature is installed. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The results are displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法執行個體化這個類別。This class cannot be instantiated. 若要查詢的作業系統功能，請使用`static`的執行個體提供此類別中。To query for operating system features, use the `static` instance of provided in this class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Feature As OSFeature
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::OSFeature ^ Feature { System::Windows::Forms::OSFeature ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 類別的 執行個體，以便用於功能查詢。

span.span: Gets a instance of the class to use for feature queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此`static`查詢作業系統功能的屬性。Use this `static` property to query for operating system features. 您無法建立此類別的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of this class. 若要判斷某項功能的版本，請呼叫方法。To determine the version of a feature, call the method. 若要判斷是否有一項功能或特定版本，請呼叫方法並指定要與這個類別中提供的功能識別碼尋找功能。To determine if a feature or a specific version is present, call the method and specify the feature to look for with the feature identifiers provided in this class. ## Examples 下列範例會查詢如功能。The following example queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Version GetVersionPresent(object feature) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version

param.name: feature
param.span: 要求特定版本的功能 ( 或 )。

span.span: The feature whose version is requested, either or .

summary.span: 擷取目前系統上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Retrieves the version of the specified feature currently available on the system.

returns.span: 表示目前可在系統上使用的指定作業系統功能版本，如果未發現此功能，則為 。

span.span: A representing the version of the specified operating system feature currently available on the system; or if the feature cannot be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，`static`的執行個體提供這個類別，來查詢的一項功能的版本號碼。Use the property, the `static` instance of provided in this class, to query for the version number of a feature. ## Examples 下列範例會查詢如功能。The following example queries for the feature. 版本會檢查以查看它是否`null`，以判斷是否有此功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`已經建立，並在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsPresent(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter enumVal) cil managed
Public Shared Function IsPresent (enumVal As SystemParameter) As Boolean

span.span: A representing the feature to search for.

summary.span: 擷取值，指出作業系統是否支援指定的功能或度量資訊 (Metric)。

span.span: Retrieves a value indicating whether the operating system supports the specified feature or metric.

returns.span: 如果此功能可以在系統上使用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the feature is available on the system; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，您會使用方法，以判斷作業系統是否支援特定功能或所識別的公制`enumValue`。Typically, you use the method to determine if the operating system supports the specific feature or metric identified by `enumValue`. 根據從傳回的值，您會在程式碼中執行條件式的動作。Based upon the value returned from , you would perform conditional actions in your code. 例如，如果呼叫此方法的參數值時傳回`true`，您可以建立主控描繪功能表應用程式中平面的樣式。For example, if calling this method with a parameter value of returns `true`, you could create owner-drawn menus in your application in a flat style. 如果沒有可用的特定作業系統版本上，存取某些系統功能或度量可以引發例外狀況。Accessing some system features or metrics can raise exceptions if they are not available on a specific operating system version. 在此情況下，第一次使用對應列舉值，以及與，以判斷是否支援度量。In this case, first use the corresponding enumeration value, along with , to determine if the metric is supported. 例如，呼叫與再取得屬性值。For example, call with before getting the property value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法列舉型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the enumeration. 此範例判斷作業系統是否支援`CaretWidth`度量，然後再呼叫屬性。The example determines if the operating system supports the `CaretWidth` metric before calling the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly LayeredWindows As Object

summary.span: 表示層次的最上層視窗功能。

span.span: Represents the layered, top-level windows feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 層疊的視窗可以透過透明或半透明作業系統。A layered window can be made transparent or translucent by the operating system. 在 Windows 2000 中引進支援層疊視窗。Support for layered windows was first introduced in Windows 2000. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 分層 Windows:: 新方式來使用半透明和透明度效果在 Windows 中的應用程式"Platform SDK 文件，網址http://msdn.microsoft.com。For more information, see the "Layered Windows: A New Way to Use Translucency and Transparency Effects in Windows Applications" in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com. 若要判斷層疊的視窗功能是否已安裝，請使用呼叫基底類別方法的屬性與做為要尋找的功能。To determine if the layered windows feature is installed, use the property to call the base class method with as the feature to look for. 或者，您可以檢查是否安裝此功能藉由呼叫方法做為要尋找的功能。Alternatively, you can check to see if the feature is installed by calling the method with as the feature to find. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷目前的系統是否支援層疊的視窗。The following example determines whether the current system supports layered windows. 基底類別方法呼叫做為要尋找的功能。The base class method is called with as the feature to look for. 結果會顯示在文字方塊中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此程式碼假設`textBox1`具現化並放置在表單上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Themes As Object

summary.span: 表示作業系統的主題功能。

span.span: Represents the operating system themes feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主題是底色圖案、 資料指標、 字型、 聲音和首度引進圖示納入 Microsoft 加號的視覺介面設定的集合 ！A theme is a collection of visual interface settings that include wallpaper, cursors, fonts, sounds, and icons first introduced in Microsoft Plus! Windows 95。for Windows 95. .NET Framework 並不直接支援操作的佈景主題，不過卻有更詳盡的支援中的視覺化樣式的命名空間。The .NET Framework does not directly support manipulating themes, although it does have extensive support for visual styles in the namespace. 如需 Windows 佈景主題的詳細資訊，請參閱主題佈景主題和視覺化樣式和 Win32 SDK 中的視覺樣式參考。For more information about Windows Themes, see the topics Themes and Visual Styles and Visual Styles Reference in the Win32 SDK. 若要判斷是否已安裝主題功能，請呼叫基底類別方法與做為要尋找的功能。To determine if the themes feature is installed, call the base class method with as the feature to look for. 或者，您可以檢查是否安裝此功能藉由呼叫方法做為要尋找的功能。Alternatively, you can check to see if the feature is installed by calling the method with as the feature to find.
